events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn’t fit and I would like to request a refund since the return window is still open.
The customer reported a refund request related to a return due to size issues.
Assigning this refund case to the Returns Specialist team for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or if it’s still in original condition with tags attached?
Thanks for your quick response! My order number is 5687321. The jacket is unworn and the tags are still on it.
Great, thanks for the details. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we’ll email you shortly, and once received, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds perfect! I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the shipping label soon.
I’ve sent the prepaid return shipping label to your email. Please use it to send back the jacket and we will finalize your refund promptly.
Just following up to check if you were able to send back the jacket and if you have received your refund as expected.
Yes, I sent the jacket two days ago and I have already received the refund. Thanks again for the smooth process!
Thank you for confirming. We are glad the refund process went smoothly. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
